entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Tillsonburg

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
